channel.title: request on gmefoias.com
channel.description: Recent content in request on gmefoias.com

item.title: 22-00069-FOIA
item.description: This request is for a transcript, meeting minutes, or a transcription of an electronic recording disclosing the identity of each speaker of the closed SEC meeting on May 13, 2021 @ 2 PM. I filed this request after a strange series of events transpired in 2021: April 13, 2021 Commissioner Hester Peirce releases Token Safe Harbor Proposal 2.0 statement - github May 11, 2021 An article titled “The Future Of Tokenized Stocks - What They Can Replace And What To Watch Out For” was released.
